section.mdiv: E5 E5 How many more times treat me the way you wanna do? How many more times treat me the way you wanna do? When I give you all my love Please, please be true
D A E5 E5 I'll give you all I've got to give, rings, pearls, and all I'll give you all I've got to give, rings, pearls, and all I've got to get you together, baby I'm sure, sure you're gonna call
E D Oh, when's the last time I done asked you? E D E D E D E D E D E D E D E D E

E5 I was a young man, I couldn't resist Started thinking it over, just what I had missed Got me a girl and I kissed her and then and then Whoops, oh no, yeah, well I did it again D Now I' got ten children of my own E D E I got another child on the way, that makes eleven D But I'm in constant heaven E I know it's all right in my mind D E 'Cause I got a little schoolgirl and she's all mine D I can't get through to her cause it doesn't permit E E But I'm gonna give her everything I've got to give

E Oh, Rosie, oh, girl Oh, Rosie, oh, girl Steal away now, steal away Steal away baby, steal away Little Robert Anthony wants to come and play Why don't you come to me, baby Steal away, alright, alright
E5 Well they call me the hunter That's my name Call me the hunter That's how I got my fame B Ain't no need to hide A Ain't no need to run E5 'Cause I've got you in the sights of my gun

E5 E5 How many more times, barrel house all night long, alright D A E5 How many more times, barrel house all night long? D A E5 Well, I've got to get to you, baby So, please come home D A E5 Why don't you listen to me, babe? D A E5 Why don't you please come home? D A E5 Why don't you please come home?
D A E5 D A E5 D A E5 Why don't you please come home
